Title: Relates to a tax on gross income upon every corporation which derives income from the data individuals of this state share with such corporations
Summary: Requires a five percent tax on gross income upon every corporation which derives income from the data individuals of this state share with such corporations; establishes the New York data fund to distribute the earnings of the five percent to each taxpayer of the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง209, Tax L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to a tax on gross income upon every corporation which derives income from the data individuals of this state share with such corporations; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York data fund
